english.segment1: Sometimes it is hard to go on. Its hard to see the reasons. For breathing, living, letting love guide the way. But you must hold on
english.segment2: Chorus. Don't give up. Don't give up. Hold on for one more day (2x)
english.segment3: Sometimes we fall down. We get ourselves in trouble. But it's okay. Cause we still have another chance to get it right. To get it right
english.segment4: Chorus. Don't give up. Don't give up. Hold on for one more day (2x)
english.segment5: I've come too far. I've seen so much. I've heard the call and felt the touch. I've tasted love that I cannot deny (2x)
english.segment6: Chorus. Don't give up. Don't give up. Hold on for one more day (2x)
